properties.areaDesc: Waters from Bonita Beach to Englewood FL out 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from Bonita Beach to Englewood FL out 20 NM; Waters from Englewood to Tarpon Springs FL out 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from Englewood to Tarpon Springs FL out 20 NM
properties.headline: Special Marine Warning issued January 4 at 11:33AM EST until January 4 at 12:15PM EST by NWS Tampa Bay Ruskin FL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Ruskin has issued a

* Special Marine Warning for...
Coastal waters from Bonita Beach to Englewood FL out 20 NM...
Coastal waters from Englewood to Tarpon Springs FL out 20 NM...
Waters from Bonita Beach to Englewood FL out 20 to 60 NM...
Waters from Englewood to Tarpon Springs FL out 20 to 60 NM...

* Until 1215 PM EST.

* At 1133 AM EST, strong thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from near Longboat Key to 26 nm southwest of Venice Inlet
to 51 nm west of Gasparilla Island, moving northeast at 25 knots.

HAZARD...Wind gusts 34 knots or greater.

SOURCE...Radar.

IMPACT...Expect wind gusts in excess of 34 knots, suddenly higher
waves, frequent lightning, and heavy downpours. Make sure
all on board are wearing life jackets.

* Locations impacted include...
M6 Reef, M15 Reef, M9 Reef, Venice Inlet, M4 Reef, Siesta Key,
Venice, M17 Reef, Lynn Silvertooth Reef, Big Sarasota Pass, M10
Reef, M5 Reef, M1 Reef, M16 Reef, New Pass, M3 Reef and Longboat
Key.
properties.instruction: Move to safe harbor until hazardous weather passes.
